thread.title: City snapshot: Consumer confidence improves in August
thread.title_full: City snapshot: Consumer confidence improves in August

title: City snapshot: Consumer confidence improves in August
text:
28 Aug 2015 | By Alec Mattinson 
UK consumer confidence in on the up, according to the latest GfK UK Consumer Confidence Index, while the FTSE rebounds and Waitrose weekly sales edge up. Available to members only
